header.title: Pro tools for skin professionals
desc: We produce study precision tools for meticulous skin professionals.

header.title: Scientific measurements
desc: Our instruments deliver scientific and objective measurements of skin for both research and aesthetic clinics. Use the right tools, and let everyone know, that you value data.

products.name: DermaLab Combo 4
products.desc: Powerful instrument for true skin analysis in research. Features up to 9 different parameters at the same time.

products.name: DermaLab Mini
products.desc: Compact instrument l for scientific skin analysis

products.name: DermaLab Aesthetic
products.desc: Skin analysis tool for aesthetic clinics. Attract more clients!

products.name: Colorimeter DSM-4
products.desc: Portable colorimeter with accurate 4-in-1 measurements of color, pigmentation, erythema and gloss.

products.name: DermaScan
products.desc: Advanced skin ultrasound with decades of scientific use.

products.name: DermaLab Single
products.desc: Skin analysis instrument with one of the following parameters: TEWL, elasticity, hydration or ultrasound.

author.name: Jakob Wested
author.text: We care about the essential factors in skin analysis and treatment - providing sturdy precision tools and rich data, in which skin professionals can rely and perform.

info-block.text1: Meet us at a trade show near you
info-block.text2: Get our news - Subscribe to our newsletter

planet-block.title: Global distributors
planet-block.subtitle: Global to local
planet-block.text1: We have distributors all around the world to ensure optimal distribution of our instruments.
planet-block.text2: If your country does not have a local distributor, you are welcome to contact us directly.

contact-us-page.meet-text: Let's meet at a fair near you, and feel free to make an appointment with us in advance.

footer.main-text: All you need when you need to know about skin
